description:
Douglas Crockford Talks about 'Upgrading the Web' at https://AngularU.com in San Francisco

This talk suggests a way forward, taking inspiration from our successful transition from NTSC to HDTV. There is a way forward to a web that is safer, easier, and as good as we desire.

Session Details:
https://angularu.com/ng/Session/2015sf/upgrading-the-web
Session Materials:
http://json.org

title: Douglas Crockford Talks about 'Upgrading the Web' at https://AngularU.com in San Francisco
